DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of the measurements represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the date of the skin
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the date of the skin response measurement?

ReferenceDocuments.name: SRDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable SRDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date of measurement can be determined from a collected date of the visit (VISDAT) and in such cases a separate measurement date field is not required.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record date of measurements using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).
